  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public void createProject(HDBManager manager)
      Allows a manager to create a new BTO project, ensuring no date overlaps with existing projects. Prompts for input details such as name, neighborhood, flat counts/prices, and application dates. Adds the project to the manager's list and saves it via ProjectService if confirmed.
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager creating the project.

    • editProject

      public void editProject(HDBManager manager)
      Enables a manager to edit a selected project they have created. Prompts for each editable field and confirms the update. Prevents edits that cause overlapping application dates with other projects.
      Specified by:
      editProject in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager editing their project.

    • deleteProject

      public void deleteProject(HDBManager manager, List<Project> allProjects)
      Allows manager to delete a project they were handling, and also removes the project from the system
      Specified by:
      deleteProject in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - Manager choosing a project to delete
      allProjects - List of all projects the manager is handling

    • toggleProjectVisibility

      public void toggleProjectVisibility(HDBManager manager)
      Allows the manager to toggle project visibility to off or on.
      Specified by:
      toggleProjectVisibility in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager toggling project visibility

    • viewAllProjects

      public void viewAllProjects(HDBManager manager, List<Project> allProjects, UserSession session)
      Displays a list of either the manager’s own projects or all available projects. Uses ProjectFilterMenu to allow viewing with filtering options.
      Specified by:
      viewAllProjects in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager initiating the view.
      allProjects - All available projects in the system.
      session - The current user session.

    • selectProject

      public Project selectProject(List<Project> projects)
      Allows the manager to select a project they are handling
      Specified by:
      selectProject in interface IManagerProjectService
      Parameters:
      projects - The list of created projects to iterate through
      Returns:
      The project chosen by the manager
